name: A Craven Story
description:
Follow two siblings in their quest to help the people of Rockhaven before it's too late.

A Craven Story is a game developed with love by Liam (9) and Oli (7) during the Coronavirus lockdown in June 2020. 

Liam and Oli finished development after only 2 weeks of being introduced to RPG Maker.

June 2020
